update T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT

COMPLAINT_CONTENT = #{complaintContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPLAINT_CONTENT = #{complaintContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADRESS = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM T_SES_BMS_ATTACHMENT WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{businessid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_DELETED = 0 AND TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT WHERE IS_DELETED = 0
AND NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
AND TITLE like '%'||#{title}||'%'
